title: Typophile | Typographic Collaboration
content:
## [Type Battle 24 // Lucha Libre](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430021857/http:/www.typophile.com/battle24 "Type Battle 24 // Lucha Libre")

**// THIS WEEK’S CHALLENGE:**

This week’s challenge has two parts. Choose one or both options for your submission.

Option 1: Using a Luchador name of your choice, <cite>draw the type</cite> that would be used to set your Luchador name onto a Lucha Libre style poster.

Option 2: Draw a set of dingbats that could be used on a Lucha Libre poster.

Bonus points and extra bragging rights for those who do BOTH and/or design a Lucha Libre poster.

References:  
 [Lucha Libre](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430021857/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucha_libre)  
 [Poster samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20080430021857/http:/flickr.com/search/?z=t&ss=2&ct=6&w=all&q=lucha+libre+poster&m=text)

// ABOUT TYPOPHILE TYPE BATTLES
author: Zara Evens
